column5: Hi            I'm going to take my 13 year old Grandson to Beaver Lake for a week of fishing early in Aug . I have fish Canada for alot of years but this is his first trip . I never fished Beaver Lake so any info will help . I know there are Bass , Walleye and Pike there need help on what the fishing is like in Aug and lake depths . Thanks for your help. Tight Lines                                                                                         Hank Flory Jr                                                                                       Lancaster Pa
